Job.Description: She will ensure that injured girls recover quickly.

Message.Name: refuse
Message.Text: ${name} refused to work as a Medic to${shift}.

Message.Name: work-night-shift
Message.Text: She prepares her tools, so she is ready to intervene should any of your girls get dangerously hurt.

Message.Name: work-day-shift
Message.Text: She tends to your recuperating girls.

Message.Name: work.perfect
Message.Text: Her vast medical knowledge and skills lets your fighters recover faster than you thought possible.

Message.Name: work.great
Message.Text: She skillfully dresses wounds and administers healing concoctions she has prepared. Your girls will be up and fighting again in no time.

Message.Name: work.good
Message.Text: She applies clean dressings to any open wounds, and administers basic healing concoctions. The girls in the infirmary are in good hands with her.

Message.Name: work.ok
Message.Text: You don't think she'd be able to handle any life-threatening injuries, but at least she knows how to apply salve to prevent wounds from getting infected.

Message.Name: work.bad
Message.Text: Unfortunately, ${name}'s idea of medicine is to pump your girls full of morphium.

Message.Name: work.worst
Message.Text: ${name} does not wash her hands before touching open wounds, and seems to be unsure of what to do with the bandages she's been provided.
